jobs.title: Community Development Officer
jobs.description: Lead community development initiatives and coordinate with local stakeholders to implement constituency projects. Work closely with community leaders to identify development needs and implement sustainable solutions.
jobs.requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Social Sciences, Development Studies, or related field
Minimum 2 years experience in community development
Strong communication and organizational skills
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
Valid driver's license
jobs.responsibilities:
Coordinate community development projects
Liaise with local leaders and stakeholders
Prepare project reports and documentation
Monitor project implementation and impact
Facilitate community meetings and workshops

jobs.title: Youth Engagement Coordinator
jobs.description: Develop and implement youth programs and initiatives to engage young people in constituency activities. Create opportunities for youth participation in community development and leadership programs.
jobs.requirements:
Diploma in Social Work, Education, or related field
Experience working with youth programs
Knowledge of youth development principles
Good interpersonal and communication skills
Computer literacy
jobs.responsibilities:
Develop youth engagement programs
Organize youth workshops and events
Coordinate with schools and youth groups
Monitor program effectiveness
Prepare activity reports

jobs.title: Administrative Assistant - Internship
jobs.description: Support administrative operations and gain experience in constituency management. Assist with office administration, documentation, and coordination of daily activities.
jobs.requirements:
Currently pursuing or recently completed diploma/degree
Basic computer skills
Good organizational abilities
Professional communication skills
Willingness to learn
jobs.responsibilities:
Assist with administrative tasks
Manage office correspondence
Support event coordination
Maintain filing systems
Provide general office support

jobs.title: Project Monitoring & Evaluation Officer
jobs.description: Monitor and evaluate constituency development projects to ensure effective implementation and impact assessment. Track project progress and prepare comprehensive evaluation reports.
jobs.requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Economics, or Development Studies
Minimum 3 years experience in M&E
Proficiency in data analysis software
Strong analytical and report writing skills
Experience with development projects
jobs.responsibilities:
Monitor project implementation
Conduct field assessments
Prepare evaluation reports
Analyze project data
Provide recommendations for improvement

jobs.title: ICT Support Technician
jobs.description: Provide technical support for ICT systems and equipment in constituency offices. Maintain computer systems, networks, and provide user support for staff.
jobs.requirements:
Diploma in Computer Science or IT
2+ years experience in IT support
Knowledge of computer hardware and software
Network troubleshooting skills
Customer service orientation
jobs.responsibilities:
Provide technical support to staff
Maintain computer systems and networks
Install and configure software
Troubleshoot technical issues
Conduct user training sessions

jobs.title: Environmental Health Officer
jobs.description: Promote environmental health and sanitation in the constituency. Conduct inspections, educate communities on health practices, and coordinate environmental health programs.
jobs.requirements:
Degree in Environmental Health or Public Health
2+ years experience in environmental health
Knowledge of sanitation and hygiene standards
Community mobilization skills
Valid professional certification
jobs.responsibilities:
Conduct environmental health inspections
Educate communities on health practices
Monitor sanitation facilities
Coordinate health campaigns
Prepare health reports

jobs.title: Community Outreach Coordinator
jobs.description: Coordinate community outreach programs and stakeholder engagement activities. Build relationships with community groups and facilitate communication between constituency office and residents.
jobs.requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Communications or Social Sciences
3+ years experience in community outreach
Strong networking and relationship building skills
Excellent communication abilities
Project management experience
jobs.responsibilities:
Develop outreach strategies
Organize community events
Build stakeholder relationships
Facilitate community consultations
Monitor outreach impact

jobs.title: Finance Assistant
jobs.description: Support financial operations and budget management for constituency projects. Assist with financial reporting, budget tracking, and procurement processes.
jobs.requirements:
Diploma in Accounting or Finance
1+ years experience in finance/administration
Knowledge of accounting principles
Proficiency in Excel and accounting software
Attention to detail
jobs.responsibilities:
Assist with budget preparation
Process financial transactions
Maintain financial records
Support procurement processes
Prepare financial reports
